message.body: For you? I don't know, which?
Did you choose already or do you want more advice?
I haven't chosen and I'm so lost and this is the worst feeling ever
Okay if I told you that you were now going to vassar and it was final what would you think? Just gut reaction?
I'm going to have to go to a liberal arts college
It might also be worth talking to nico or Kylie or just someone else with a different view
I think I'm going to choose vassar. There's a lot of time to have adventures in the real world
I think I should focus on my education first

If you think that is educationally best then that makes sense. I don't think you can go wrong with vassar and if you leave for hating the culture other schools will still like you a lot. Wait like5 minutes and if the choice still makes sense and you don't want to cry then go for it
Also still maybe run it by another friend so I'm not the only influence
I commit and then cried. I can't tell if I'm happy or not but its something
You're done and your going to an awesome school and you don't need to feel shitty anymore! There was no wrong answer! Yaaaay!
Ohmygosh tomorrow is gonna be so much fun for you! You're free! Yaaaay!
